name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond Records
description:
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond Records is an action-adventure game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond Records is available on Android and iOS. The game is sold via Google Play.
